title: Companion animal nutrition: Where we are and where we're headed
content: As pet ownership increases and owners become more passionate about their pets, there is an increasing demand for high-quality pet foods that support pet health. The pet food market often mimics the human food market as more pets are considered “part of the family.” As such, pet food formulations have been altered to support weight loss, gastrointestinal health, skin and coat health, and more. As the industry continues to emphasize functional foods, it is imperative that we continue to assess and improve products in terms of efficacy, safety, and production efficiency. This issue of Animal Frontiers focuses on companion animal nutrition.
